testcase.name: DBS Awards validation
testcase.system-out: Given Browser is launched and DBS web URL is entered........................passed When User click on Learn More button........................................passed And User navigate to Singapore..............................................passed Then Read the table in excel sheet..........................................passed And User navigate to About in the header tabs...............................passed And User navigate to Who we are tab.........................................passed And User navigate to Our Awards & Accolades.................................passed Then Validate the total number of awards....................................passed And validate the name and caption of the awards.............................passed
